alert.note: Alert for Dorchester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 30 at 4:00PM EDT until further notice by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF COLLETON AND DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 400 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Givhans Ferry State Park, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include: Givhans Ferry State Park and Givhans. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
